data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Houston.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elton Garcia signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 9, Adam Lundqvist for Houston has been booked by Elton Garcia and receives a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Minnesota’s Hassani Dotson and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 11, Hassani Dotson for Minnesota is back on the field again.
Minnesota take a 1-0 lead thanks to Ethan Finlay.
That's a fine assist from Robin Lod.
In the minute 13, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
Elton Garcia waits before resuming play because Hassani Dotson for Minnesota is still down.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Osvaldo Alonso is on a sub for Hassani Dotson for Minnesota.
Houston to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Can Houston capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Houston at Allianz Field.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 22, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Elton Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 25, Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Ariel Lassiter (Houston) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Houston's Darwin Quintero breaks free at Allianz Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 26, Elton Garcia awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Houston to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
In the minute 28, Elton Garcia signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Goal! Ethan Finlay extends Minnesota's lead to 2-0.
Jacori Hayes instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Saint Paul Houston drive forward through Ariel Lassiter. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Mauro Manotas (Houston) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Throw-in high up the field for Houston in Saint Paul.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
Romain Metanire (Minnesota) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Houston are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Houston.
The first-half is over at Allianz Field.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Allianz Field.
Minnesota's Kevin Molino gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Houston make their first substitution with Niko Hansen replacing Ariel Lassiter.
In the minute 47, Elton Garcia signals a Minnesota throw-in in Houston's half.
Throw-in Houston.
Houston are coming forward and Niko Hansen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Elton Garcia signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Minnesota's area.
In the minute 49, Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Memo Rodriguez for Houston drives towards goal at Allianz Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Houston.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 52, Houston are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, In Saint Paul, Houston push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Minnesota.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 55, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Houston needs to be cautious. Minnesota have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Houston at Allianz Field.
Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Elton Garcia awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Houston drives forward and Darwin Quintero gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Memo Rodriguez. .
Darwin Quintero with an assist there.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Elton Garcia signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Minnesota's area.
Houston's Memo Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 63, Elton Garcia awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
In the minute 66, Elton Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Houston push forward at Allianz Field and Memo Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Houston.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Houston.
The home team have replaced Ethan Finlay with Marlon Hairston. This is the second substitution made today by Adrian Heath.
Throw-in high up the field for Minnesota in Saint Paul.
In the minute 70, Aaron Schoenfeld is replacing Kei Kamara for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
Houston drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Houston at Allianz Field.
In the minute 74, Houston are caught offside.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Jose Bizama is replacing Victor Cabrera for the away team.
Houston to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
In the minute 76, Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
Elton Garcia signals a Minnesota throw-in in Houston's half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Houston.
Elton Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Houston at Allianz Field.
In the minute 79, Houston pushes forward through Darwin Quintero, whose finish on goal is saved.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Throw-in Houston.
In the minute 83, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Niko Hansen gets an equalizer for Houston. The score is now 2-2.
Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Houston.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Minnesota.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Elton Garcia signals a Houston throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston push upfield and Darwin Ceren gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Minnesota defence.
Mauro Manotas (Houston) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Free kick for Houston in the half of Minnesota.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Jacori Hayes (Minnesota) gets a yellow card.
Tab Ramos is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Field with Sam Junqua replacing Adam Lundqvist.
